modShortDescription: This mod slows the player down when walking through grass. Default is 20% slower than vanilla. Gives reason to clearing an area you walk often.
modDescription:
This mod slows the player down when walking through grass.

* Default is 20% slower than vanilla.
* Decrease in movement speed when walking through the various grasses. Gives reason to clearing an area you walk often.
* Can be adjusted in the xml file easily to suit your needs.
* Configured to work with the Walk Slower mod. Without the walk slower mod the change in speed is more dramatic. Increase 10% if not using it.

**Updated to v1.1**  
Adds a couple missed bushes/grasses.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Su1C1daL/Su1C1dal-7DTD-Mods/tree/master/Su1C1dal%207DTD%20Grass%20Walking%20Slowdown)**
